(Yeah, you guys may be doing great in the other categories, but guess 
who is leading in the best RPGer? Oh yeah!*Does victory dance.* Damn 
it! I forgot. People skills. Now they all hate me. I find it ironic 
that i'm in for best RPGer, but none of my chars are up for any 
awards.)

Vulois

Vulis walked back intot he cave with Child in his arms. He layed him 
down on the floor and watched him. He turrned to Terradive and 
Windrazor.

"Go back to the embassy and pick up Afterburner and Eagle Eye. Bring 
the rest of the equipment. I'm going to stay here and look after 
Child."

Vulois feared the worst. The Dark Angel must have inflicted Child 
with something. Vulois had some ideas to do something, but he didn't 
want to try until he saw a change in his health. He stayed by Child 
vigilantly.
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq

Flip responded to Ramulus inside himself.

Yeah, the reapirs went great. But your spark must have rubbed off on 
me some how. I'm now a fuzor. Half fox, half ram. Do you want to get 
out now?
______________________________________________________________________
Tamron vs. Savage

Tamron, the bot made up by the 5 Trainers, and the viciuos Savage 
prepared to do battle. Savage started off with 3 fireballs, but onyl 
oen hit Tamron. Tamron flew into the air and started throwing down 
spear, but Savage flew up to meet them. The 2 giants did battle in 
the sky, as jaws and claws ripped and roared. Finaly they were two 
tired and nearly crashed back to teh ground. Tamron struggled up.

"Tamron Transform!"

Tamron went to Robot mode and brought out it's greatest weapon: The 
Tamer. They fired, and it shot a small microchip into the back of 
Savage's neck. He let up a wild scream as it sunk into his nervous 
system. It took control of his mind, forcing him to do anything the 
Trainers said. Tamron went back to the 5 Trainers.

"Excellent!" shouted Prebon, "Now to plan for our first attack!"

The Trainers and their new slave Savage headed back to base.
